title: Beast in the Darkness
description: *FREE**Meant to be read after Fire In The Darkness*Beast In The Darkness (An Elighan Dragen Novelette)We know the story from Ember's POV, but what happens to Eli after Ember disappears? Crawl inside Eli's mind and experience what he goes through. Be warned his mind in not a fuzzy warm place to be....**Warning this contains sexual content and language.**Contains Spoilers if you have not previously read Darkness Of Light or Fire In The Darkness.LINK: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1f...I HOPE YOU ENJOY IT!
author: Stacey Marie Brown
